messages.messageBody:

>> Joyce
>> (a regular poster)

Oops, I'm sorry! I'd just ended all my other posts with "Unschooling-dotcom

It was just a joke :-)

Joyce

messages.subject: HUH?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/10/2002 6:21:02 PM US Mountain Standard Time, ... Well I wondered the same thing and didn t know what it meant, if it was implying
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/10/2002 6:21:02 PM US Mountain Standard Time,
windystreet@... writes:

> Joyce
> (a regular poster)
>
> Kate wrote: Oh I get it now - I'm not a regular poster, therefor my opinion
> doesn't
> count. It doesn't matter that we've been unschooling or whatever you want
> to call it for many years now. It doesn't matter that my opinion has
> raised two bright, inquisitive, daring, funny and smart kids. I joined
> this list the first time over a year ago and was disgusted by the attitude
> of people here - I still am.
>
Well I wondered the same thing and didn't know what it meant, if it was
implying something or what???
